column5: Haven't been posting here much lately.  With moving up north and college generally keeping me too busy to fish, I was eagerly awaiting this reading week to head back home and hit up my favourite steelhead waters.  I arrived to prime water conditions and decent numbers of fish.  Hope all you steelheaders got out and enjoyed the prime conditions.  Here's some pics.  Enjoy.  All fish were released.       Now for some northern speckles.

Well done man...Some nice brutes there.  Looks like I'll have to crank out some jigs on the vice ASAP...  Congrats on staying busy at school...As we know, skipping classes to go fishing is wrong...Most of the time...
seems like a good week end
nice Shootin.  Those bows look so pretty.
